## Who are we?

![](images/logo-wide.png)

The Perception, Action, & Development Lab is directed by [Dr. John Franchak](people/john-franchak.qmd) in the UC Riverside [Department of Psychology](https://psychology.ucr.edu/). Dr. Franchak advises students in the [Developmental](https://psychology.ucr.edu/faculty-research/areas-of-study/#tab-id-3) and [Cognition and Cognitive Neuroscience](https://psychology.ucr.edu/faculty-research/areas-of-study/#tab-id-2) areas of the Psychology Department.

## Join our team

We are also hiring a new full-time staff researcher in Summer 2022. Please check the [job posting](posts/2022-06-29-job-posting.qmd) for more details. 

We are accepting applications for undergraduate research assistants on a rolling basis. Please fill out the [form](https://forms.gle/QJgJk5CZxzj8qufr5), and we will get back to you when we have openings.
